devdoc.author: Julien Niset - <julien@argent.im>Olivier Van Den Biggelaar - <olivier@argent.im>
devdoc.details: Module to manage the state of a wallet's lock. Other modules can use the state of the lock to determine if their operations should be authorised or blocked. Only the guardians of a wallet can lock and unlock it. The lock automatically unlocks after a given period. The lock state is stored on a saparate contract to facilitate its use by other modules.

addModule(address,address).details: Adds a module to a wallet. First checks that the module is registered.

params._data: The data for the relayed transaction
params._gasLimit: The gas limit to use for the gas refund.
params._gasPrice: The gas price to use for the gas refund.
params._nonce: The nonce used to prevent replay attacks.
params._signatures: The signatures as a concatenated byte array.

getLock(address).details: Returns the release time of a wallet lock or 0 if the wallet is unlocked.
getLock(address).return: The epoch time at which the lock will release (in seconds).

getNonce(address).details: Gets the current nonce for a wallet.

init(address).details: Inits the module for a wallet by logging an event. The method can only be called by the wallet itself.

isLocked(address).details: Checks if a wallet is locked.
isLocked(address).return: true if the wallet is locked.

lock(address).details: Lets a guardian lock a wallet.

recoverToken(address).details: Utility method enbaling anyone to recover ERC20 token sent to the module by mistake and transfer them to the Module Registry.

unlock(address).details: Lets a guardian unlock a locked wallet.

devdoc.title: LockManager
